item.title: EVE Frontier Goes Public Today with Founder Access: New Era
item.content:encoded:
https://wccftech.com/eve-frontier-goes-public-today-with-founder-access-new-era/

CCP Games announced that EVE Frontier, its new space survival MMO, has now opened public access with 'Founder Access: New Era' following the previous Closed Alpha stage.

EVE Frontier is set in an enigmatic and hostile galaxy shaped by its players' activities. Players inhabit Riders: awakened clones flung into the Frontier without purpose or memory of the world around them. As they explore the darkness, they must construct shelters, form Tribes, and gather resources to increase their power and survive the ever-present danger of annihilation.

Founder Access: New Era also introduces a brand-new seasonal progression system for EVE Frontier called Cycles. The first cycle, Promised Lands, begins today. Players will earn Grace by completing in-game missions and activities and rise to the top of each Cycle Leaderboard alongside their Tribe. As the New Era progresses, new missions, objectives, and content will be introduced in subsequent Cycles.

There are three Founder's Packs, each granting different perks:

EVE Frontier Founder Access $39.99 $69.99 $99.99
FEATURES
FOUNDER ACCESS YES YES YES
CLONE SERIAL NO. YES YES YES
CHARACTER PORTRAIT YES YES YES
FOUNDER DISCORD ROLE YES YES YES
MONTHLY DEV STREAMS YES YES YES
SUBSCRIPTION AT LAUNCH 1 Month 2 Months 4 Months
EXCLUSIVE SHIP SKINS 1x 2x 3x
NAME RESERVATION NO YES YES
EARLY START AT LAUNCH NO 24 hours 72 hours
And more

The system requirements for EVE Online are exactly the same as EVE Online. You can find them below.

Minimum Requirements:

  • OS: MacOS or Windows 10 64-bit
  • CPU: Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz
  • RAM: 4 GB or higher
  • Video: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM

Recommended Requirements

  • OS: MacOS or Windows 10 64-bit
  • CPU: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • RAM: 16 GB or higher
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM

For a thorough interview with CCP Games about EVE Online, EVE Frontier, and EVE Vanguard, check out this article from EVE Fanfest 2025.
